name: overstep
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to go further than what is considered acceptable or correct: The bad language in that show overstepped the limits/boundaries of what should be allowed on television. I think you're overstepping your authority.

Idiom
overstep the mark
Add to word list
Add to word list
to go beyond what is permitted or acceptable: He overstepped his authority in agreeing to those terms.
